GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix use-after-free in ufx_ops_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.296 by commit fa008859983d9231b9241a4b9eac7aabfbb45155. For more details please see the references link.
